comment: Derive the associative law for complex number addition ~ addass to demonstrate the use of the properties of a normed subcomplex vector space for the complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 9-Oct-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
